title: Independence National Historical Park: Plan Your Visit
body: Plan Your Visit      Â            Basic Information   Get all the basic information you need for a successful visit to the park with just a few clicks or taps.        Places to Go   With over a dozen park buildings and green spaces to explore, you have plenty of options of places to go.              Things to Do   Discover, wonder, explore...there is something for everyone at Independence.        Trip Itineraries   Use our trip itineraries to explore the park sites - from the "must sees" to the hidden gems.
